Description:
Elevated, low maintenance and private
Youll love:
The privacy and elevated position provided by this low-maintenance double-storey home, conveniently located in popular Wombah Park.
The large downstairs kitchen/dining/living space, with adjoining north-facing courtyard providing natural sunlight and a lush green outlook.
A well-considered floorplan - perfect for those wanting ground-level living plus the master bedroom and ensuite also downstairs.
Plus:
Two further bedrooms with built-in robes, a study area and bathroom located on the upper level.
Other features include a double lock-up garage plus further off-street parking, air-conditioning, 2020L water tank to service the garden and all in close proximity to the shops, nature-filled Deep Creek, schools and public transport.
The master suite downstairs has extra large doors for easy wheelchair mobility and an accessible shower, along with a generous size walk in robe.

Description:
The Best Start or the Finest Finish
Nestled away from major arterials in a quiet family-orientated pocket of the ever-popular suburb of Waurn Ponds, this three-bedroom home is sure to comfortably fit the brief from the first home buyer right through to the last.
Offering a light and bright feel from the moment you walk through the front door, your open plan living, dining and kitchen area are bathed in natural light and contrast beautifully against the greenery of established gardens in the rear yard - simply delightful on the eye.
Extending from your main living zone, double doors open out onto your fantastic decked alfresco that hosts a beautiful open fire and café blinds to block any nasty weather to ensure you can entertain all year round without hesitation.
The flexibility of this home is key. Inside, a second living zone at the front of the home could be used for the home office or simply a retreat for the kids. Outside, double gates from the carport open fully for easy trailer, boat or caravan storage.
It's all here for you and only 5 minutes walk to the Waurn Ponds Train Station or the same in the car to Leisurelink & Waurn Ponds Shopping Centre.
Insights: 10 Blackheath Mews, Waurn Ponds VIC 3216 was last sold in 2020 and 19 other 3 bedroom house in Waurn Ponds have recently been sold.

Description:
The Perfect Entertainer
Tucked away in a quiet court location, this home has something to impress every member of the family! Comprising of 4 bedrooms, the master with large ensuite and WIR, while the remaining bedrooms include BIRs. The first of 3 living areas located towards the front of the home offers flexibility with study attached. Further into the heart of the home you will find the open plan light filled living, dining and kitchen area. The stunning kitchen is equipped with stainless appliances, ample storage and 900mm oven and gas cooktop. Further attached to this is the kids playroom/rumpus room drenched with natural light. From the main living space, glass sliding doors open out on to an incredible entertaining area creating a beautiful indoor-outdoor connection that inspires relaxed living.
Extras Include:
- Ducted heating
- Ducted evaporative cooling
- 3 Living areas
- Office/study with built in desk and cabinets
- Security shutters
- Remote DLUG
Close to schools, public transport and a short drive down the coast for weekends away, this perfect entertainer in a quiet court location is ready to move straight in. Ticking every box for blissful family living, youll need to act swiftly to secure this terrific opportunity!

Description:
Exclusive Pocket, Entry Level Price
Enviably located in one of Highton's most sought after pockets amongst $1m plus homes, this cherished family home is awaiting its next chapter! The living zone and alfresco showcase breathtaking views over the Barwon River, while the heated pool will delight everyone in the family!
A laidback lifestyle is yours to keep with the delights of Queens Park within easy reach - head to the Queens Park Golf Course, break a sweat at the sporting grounds, or enjoy a family picnic whenever you please. The Barwon River walking trails are just moments away, along with the scenic Buckley Falls lookout. Families will appreciate easy access to a selection of schools, including Newtown's private colleges.
It's clear to see that this home has been well-loved over the years, with the interiors granting you the option to move straight in or to update with a contemporary touch (STCA). The floorplan is conveniently set over one level, making this is a rare find in the Highton hills.
The open plan living/dining zone creates a wealth of space for the whole family to enjoy, while the family room provides yet another generous retreat. The kitchen exudes classic style with white cabinetry, a built-in pantry, and appliances (dishwasher, wall oven, gas hob, rangehood). Entertainers will be in their element with both living zones opening onto the spacious alfresco deck, which captures views from the River to GMHBA Stadium. You'll love that you can kick back under the shade of the alfresco or soak up the sun in the poolside area (complete with a built-in umbrella), while the kids splash and play in the pool. With established hedges lining the fence, a lovely sense of privacy is created.
Overlooking the front yard, the Master Bedroom features built-in robes and an en suite. Three additional bedrooms with built-in robes share close access to the main bathroom with spa bath, while the separate toilet and laundry complete the layout. Zoned ducted heating/cooling, an air conditioner, and ceiling fans keep you comfortable in all seasons. The oversized single lock-up carport provides secure parking.
Putting the elements in place for a blissful family lifestyle, you'll need to act swiftly to secure this treasured family home! Inspect without delay!
*All information about the property has been provided to Hayeswinckle by third parties. Hayeswinckle has not verified the information and does not warrant its accuracy or completeness. Parties should make and rely on their own enquiries in relation to this property.
Insights: 15 Montrose Place, Highton VIC 3216 was last sold in 2020 and 108 other 4 bedroom house in Highton have recently been sold.

Description:
Spacious Lifestyle Opportunity
Discover the privilege of a coastal lifestyle that amplifies space, luxury & privacy. Positioned on over an acre (approx. 4378m2) of land in the highly sought-after Frog Hollow Estate, Torquay, it is only moments from pristine beaches, retail convenience & all practical town assets.
Built to exacting specifications, this 4-bedroom, dual living room residence stands sentry from its elevated position, overlooking immaculate lawns & the surrounding treed Estate landscape to the nearby playground. Mature proteas & a flowering gum provide a natural privacy screen to the welcoming front entry, where ones first impressions are of grandeur & sophistication.
The south aspect is enjoyed by a formal sitting room with concealed study nook, as well as the luxurious Master suite & a delightful guest room, all decorated with single track floor to ceiling linen drapes that add style & grace. Both main bedrooms boast high quality en suites, incorporating frameless showers & Caesarstone benchtops, with a soothing colour palette & tile choice.
Oriented to maximise the enviable northerly aspect, the home asserts itself with a soaring boathouse ceiling that extends outward, encompassing a huge alfresco space. A totally seamless connection between indoor & outdoor entertaining is achieved by opening up the high-performance stacking sliding doors from both the kitchen hub & living area, cosy with a gas log fire.
Kitchens dont come more impressive than this, complete with stone bench tops, quality stainless steel appliances (900mm oven/gas hob/DW), walk-in butlers pantry & abundant cupboard space. The central main bathroom offers a bath, shower, vanity & separate toilet, servicing the additional north-facing minor bedrooms. Utilities include a generous laundry & internal access to a RC double garage with extra storage. Add to this a 14.4 x 9 metre shed with side access, 3 high roller doors, wood fire, kitchenette & full en suite, & you have the ultimate man cave from which to work & play.
Many other features include: solid Tassie Oak floors, cellar, ducted heating/refrigerated cooling, 5-kilowatt solar power, solar hot water, double glazed windows, surround sound, ducted vacuum, security system, video intercom & 110,000 litre water tank with sub cleaning filter.
Fully landscaped including a rockery garden & orchard, this haven offers coastal living at its best!
Insights: 6 Frog Hollow Drive, Torquay VIC 3228 was last sold in 2018 and 139 other 4 bedroom house in Torquay have recently been sold.

Description:
Lifestyle & Location
This unit is all quality and offers the lifestyle you have been looking for in a location that is second to none. The bedroom is vast with large walk-in-robe, with a central bathroom that is spacious & practical. The living zone is the icing on the cake, open from the lounge to dining to the sizeable well-appointed kitchen with quality appliances and an abundance of bench and cupboard space. This area is light filled and yet the windows are tinted to reduce the summer heat. Step out into your private and tranquil courtyard, offering a car space. The quaint home is comfortable year round with reverse cycle split system plus loads of cupboard space which is always handy. Best of all step out and stroll down High Street for all the shopping you could require or walk that little further to enjoy exercise down by the Barwon River or simply jump on a bus to be in central Geelong in minutes, convenience is an understatement. Whether you are ready to down size or start out, this home and location is everything you have been looking for.
Due Diligence checklist are available at www.consumer.vic.gov.au/duediligencechecklist

Description:
Immaculately presented 1st home, downsizer or investment.
Recently refurbished with impeccable taste, you will not only fall in love with this property's style, but also the functional layout that incorporates space, storage and natural light.
Timber look floors in the main activity areas contrast well with the neutral tones and are highlighted by just the right amount of timber features throughout the home.
A master bedroom to the front includes walk in robe and enjoys ensuite access into the main bathroom, whilst 2 more bedrooms both include built in robes and are positioned away from the main living area. Creating storage during the refurbishment has been a focus with a large storage cupboard near the front, linen cupboard, additional walk in robe space and smartly designed shelving in the garage leaving this property unparalleled for storage capabilities compared to similar style homes.
The open plan design allows the chef of the home complete view of all activities from the beautifully designed kitchen that offers stainless gas cook top, electric oven, dishwasher, appliance cupboard and features timber tops with plenty of preparation space and a breakfast bar.
The living area has reverse cycle air conditioning and a gas heater to control the climate, whilst the upgraded family sized hot water unit and retractable awnings are further additions made to the home for your comfort.
Opening out from the dining, a north facing pergola affords you privacy with screening and the cafe blinds create a usable space year round.
An additional free standing undercover alfresco area is the feature of a rear yard which has been smartly designed with purposed garden beds, established trees along the fence line for privacy, a garden shed and enough grassed area for the kids and pets.
The remote garage provides full rear access for additional secure parking for caravan, boat, trailer etc with enough space at the front for another car off street.
Grovedale Primary, Nido Early Learning Centre, IGA supermarket, Marshall train station, Anytime Fitness, The Grovedale Hotel, Waurn Ponds creek walking/cycling tracks and more are within walking distance, whilst numerous other schools of all levels and larger shopping complexes are within 5 minutes drive providing a convenient location within a private cul-de-sac setting. The Geelong CBD and waterfront are 10 minutes to the North, whilst a 15 minutes drive delivers you to Torquay and the surfcoast offering some of the world's best beaches.
This well designed, beautifully refurbished, low maintenance home should be top of your list.
Call Dion Plumb on 0424 940 629 to learn more.
Insights: 8 Michael Court, Grovedale VIC 3216 was last sold in 2020 and 143 other 3 bedroom house in Grovedale have recently been sold.

Description:
COURT THIS FAMILY OPPORTUNITY
Open the door to a convenient and comfortable family lifestyle with this three-bedroom home in a quiet court on the doorstep of the Surf Coast.
With an open-plan kitchen, dining and living zone, large al fresco deck and private enclosed yard, the home is move-in ready for a family on the go.
And when the weather is warm, its just a 15-minute drive to the beach at Torquay.
Youre also spoilt for shopping at Waurn Ponds Shopping Centre, nearby Grovedale Aldi and IGA supermarkets, Village Warralily Shopping Centre and Armstrong Creek Town Centre, due to open on July 29.
The homes quality kitchen overlooks a light-filled family living space, alongside a convenient Euro-style laundry.
The nearby rear deck boasts a large undercover area, allowing easy outdoor entertaining in all weather.
The master bedroom suite features a high-end ensuite and built-in robes, while the two other bedrooms have built-in robes and are served by a central bathroom with bath and shower.
Outside, the backyard lawn is perfect for the kids to play within earshot or they can branch out to kick a footy or ride their bikes in the court.
Other features include timber floors in high-traffic areas, split-system unit, double garage with workshop space and low-maintenance gardens.
Quality local schools include Oberon High School, Christian College, Mandama Primary and Nazareth Catholic Primary.
The property is a short drive to the Ring Road and Marshall and Waurn Ponds railway stations for commuters, along with walking and cycling trails to Waurn Ponds. Leisurelink swimming pool, Deakin University and Epworth Hospital are within easy reach too.
Insights: 6 Birrilee Court, Grovedale VIC 3216 was last sold in 2020 and 143 other 3 bedroom house in Grovedale have recently been sold.

Description:
Brand New With Bay Views
This brand new four bedroom townhouse is ideal for a busy family who enjoys entertaining. The clever floor plan takes advantage of the wonderful northerly aspect and the spacious upstairs living has fabulous views of Corio Bay and the You Yangs. Other features include undercover balcony fully equipped modern kitchen with walk in pantry, study nook, main bedroom with views, walk in robe, ensuite, a second living area with deck and an additional three bedrooms downstairs, central heating and cooling, double garage with auto door and internal access, wide drive for boat or trailer plus a landscaped garden. Ready to move in and enjoy.

Description:
Functional Family Living with Side Access
With plenty of space for the whole family to enjoy, this sensational home is ready and waiting for you to make your own. The perfect starter for first home buyers, young families, downsizers still wanting space to tinker or a savvy investment, this will tick all boxes.
Taking advantage of the natural light throughout, the free-flowing floorplan offers flexible family living. The heart of the home offers itself in the way of an open plan kitchen, equipped with SS appliances, breakfast bench and an abundance of storage, which overlooks the dining and open family area.
The master suite sits at the fore, with WIR and fully equipped ensuite, with the remaining 2 spacious bedrooms offering BIR positioned from the central hallway. A 2nd separate living area, family bathroom, laundry and toilet complete this practical abode, which is also equipped with ducted heating and split system cooling.
With sliding double door access from the hub of the heart, effortless outdoor entertaining is on offer all year round. The impressive undercover alfresco overlooks the open grassed space, with a concreted open area also providing a wealth of outdoor living.
What sets this property apart from the rest is the space for all the toys! Set upon a 535m2 parcel, multiple cars, caravans, trailers and everything in between can be safely secured in the DLUG or the gated side access, which offers through access to the back garden.
All major amenities, schools, public transport and the Bellarine Rail Trail at your fingertips, with the best of the Bellarine and the Geelong CBD only 10 minutes away, It's easy to see why Leopold is becoming increasingly popular, with no signs of slowing down!
*All information about the property has been provided to Hayeswinckle by third parties. Hayeswinckle has not verified the information and does not warrant its accuracy or completeness. Parties should make and rely on their own enquiries in relation to this property.

Address: APARTMENT 1.01 / 1 Zeally Bay Road Torquay VIC 3228
Description:
STATE OF THE ART ZEALLY ONE PROJECT APARTMENT 1.01
Zeally One is a unique project offering the best of quality and design in the very sought-after location of Old Torquay. With one first floor 2-bedroom residence available overlooking Taylor Park the construction is due for completion by late 2020. Architecturally designed with affordability, location, generously sized and quality, Zeally One features advance building technology, engineering and environmentally sustainable design for efficient living at lower cost. This residence as one car park with the additional features such as 2 bathrooms, reverse cycle heating and cooling, kitchen upgrades such as Miele appliances, integrated fridge, and kitchen island bench. Zeally One is residential living of architectural quality and refinement. Through the use of natural materials and a high level of craftsmanship, the design aesthetic is inspired by both local surroundings and Australian surf coast heritage. Secluded from the main thoroughfares, but only meters from the beach, Gilbert Street, Torquay's retail precinct and across from Taylor's Park. Zeally One is the perfect balance of privacy and destination.
For further information enquire today as opportunities like these are extremely hard to find!

Description:
PICTURE PERFECT FAMILY HOME
Positioned in the Stretton Estate this 3 bedroom property is an ideal first home, investment property or one for the retiree, combining quality inclusions with precision craftsmanship that delivers a well-rounded floor plan with an edgy, ultra-modern feel, you will be impressed with this near new single storey family home.
North facing and flooded with natural light the open plan kitchen / dining and living features floor to ceiling windows and doors that open out to a spacious outdoor entertaining area, low maintenance gardens and grassed area, the contemporary kitchen features walk in pantry, stone bench tops, 900mm Smeg cooktop and oven. The master bedroom with walk in robe, en-suite, complete with dual vanity is situated to the front of the residence while the two remaining bedrooms inclusive of built in robes and family bathroom are located to the rear. A great sized separate second living / rumpus room also located to the rear of the home provides a fantastic playroom for the children or billiard room for the adults.
Features include: Split system heating and cooling, ceiling fans to all bedrooms, high ceilings, good linen/storage, powder room, double lock up garage with rear roller door access sited on a great sized 555m2 allotment.
Providing you with easy-care living in a convenient and family-friendly location, within walking distance to Torquay Coast primary school and minutes from Surf Coast Secondary College, sporting amenities (footy, soccer, netball and skate park), community pavilion, farmer's market and Dunes Shopping Village and Torquay's beautiful beaches. Enquire today, as its sure to move quickly.

Description:
Custom home with captivating views.
IMPORTANT NOTICE REGARDING COVID-19:
Open for inspections will no longer be scheduled for the public. To organise your own private viewing, please contact Deane Hughes on 0407 926 659 or Kingston Wade on 0438 033 999.
Standing proudly on 614m2 of elevated land, this magnificent custom built 5 bedroom family home offers stunning views over the hills of Highton and could be the perfect home for those searching for space, privacy, and quality.
On entry, the beautiful downstairs living area is filled with natural light and makes for a welcoming entry. As you walk upstairs, you are greeted with an abundance of living space that seamlessly integrates with the lavish outdoor entertaining alfresco, complete with cafe blinds, merbau decking, and of course, pristine views over the region. The large kitchen overlooks the upstairs living space and is great for entertaining with its bold stainless steel splashback, quality cabinetry, and gas/electric appliances.
Adjacent to the kitchen is a large home office with space for two - ideal for those that work from home. This room could also be used as a kid's playroom, with the added advantage of closing it off when guests visit.
The downstairs accommodation provides comfort over the summer months and is comprised of a total of 5 bedrooms. The opulent main bedroom features a walk-in robe and ensuite with a spa bath. Adjacent to the main bedroom is a small bedroom, ideal for a nursery or second study. Three more bedrooms to the rear of the home all offer built-in robes and are serviced by a large central bathroom with separate toilet.
Noteworthy features include:
34 square home
American oak flooring throughout
Large walk-in linen press
Dedicated workshop/storage room facing backyard
Spacious and low maintenance North facing backyard
Gas Central heating
Split System Air Conditioning in the upstairs living
Large double garage with tall rear roller door
This great property located in a quiet court is just a short drive from Waurn Ponds shopping centre, Deakin University, Epworth Hospital, Geelong CBD, Geelong Ring Road, and within walking distance to parkland, walking tracks, and public transport.
All of this, as well as the Waurn Ponds train station being just a couple minutes up the road, this property is the perfect blend of space and convenience. Enquire today!

Description:
TITLED LAND in Highton!
Situated in the highly sought after Highton Ridge Estate, this West facing titled block of land is sure to impress! Boasting a 20m frontage, this 856m2 lot is titled and ready to go! This land presents as a great opportunity to enter into the market in Highton and to enjoy the lifestyle on offer.
The Barrabool Hills plaza is a short drive away, which features a 24/7 gym, chemist, supermarkets and cafes - all minutes away from the future front door. Geelong CBD and the Surf Coast both within 15 minute drive with easy access to the Geelong Ring Road adding to the convenience. The Barwon River, Epworth Hospital, Waurn Ponds shopping centre, Deakin University and an abundance of public and private schools are all close by, offering a perfect location to build your first home, or the next home for the growing family.
Space, location and convenience are all covered with this golden opportunity. Don't miss out on this titled allotment, with the new $25,000 Homebuilders Grant available to eligible buyers it is sure to not last long.

Description:
Truly Comfortable Living in Leopolds Finest Estate
'They don't build them like they used to' rings true with this thoughtfully built and custom designed home.
Unlike the typical 'volume' builds common throughout newer Estates, no stone has been left unturned with the generous living accommodation and quality fitout that is on offer which truly can only be appreciated with an inspection.
For the recreationally minded, the Bellerine Rail Trail entry is directly over the road, whilst the Leopold Memorial Reserve and Canowindra Reserve are close-by. There's easy access to The Gateway Plaza for all your shopping and dining needs, with the Leopold Community Hub, library and confirming how resourceful your new lifestyle could be!
3 double bedrooms all with ceiling fan and extended BIRs
Master features dual entry walk-thru-robe plus ensuite with separate WC
Expansive, light-filled open plan kitchen, living and dining with sheer & block-out blinds
Ample kitchen bench space plus additional cupboard storage with oversized pantry
2nd separate living area ideal for guests/separate tv-viewing
Zoned gas-ducted heating throughout plus evaporative cooling
Fully-upgraded alfresco with four-season blinds, bluestone pavers, spotted gum decking, electric awning & ceiling fan plus outdoor powerpoints and gas connection for genuine BBQ cooking
Approx gross yield of 4.7% for the savvy investor
For full inclusions list please contact agent
At Wilsons we are conscious of playing our part in reducing the spread of COVID-19. We will therefore be conducting our property inspections using best practice sanitary measures to ensure everyone's safety. We can also arrange a virtual tour of the home if that better suits. Contact us today.

Description:
HIGH AND MIGHTY
Enjoy the heights of classy family living in this elevated contemporary home boasting commanding views across Geelong and the Surf Coast.
Light-filled and spacious on a 905sqm (approx.) corner block, the double-storey brick home is readymade for entertaining in style.
And with two distinct zones on two levels, its ideal for a growing family to spread out and find their own space.
Youll never tire of stunning views as far as the eye can see from the upstairs family living, dining and kitchen zone that boasts a wall of windows and spills out onto an alfresco deck.
With the high-end kitchen overlooking the living and entertaining spaces, the chef will always be at the centre of activity.
The kitchen features quality appliances, stone benchtops, island bench with breakfast bar, tiled splashback and loads of storage options.
The upper level is also home to a large separate lounge room, study, powder room and master bedroom with ensuite and walk-in robe that enjoys its own wing plus those scenic views.
Teenagers or guests will welcome the privacy of the lower level, with three bedrooms with built-in robes, central rumpus room, family bathroom and laundry.
Step out to a timber deck overlooking an enclosed lawn area ideal for kids to play safely.
Other highlights include a double garage, 2 street frontages both with driveways to park additional vehicles perfect for the Caravan, Boat and Trailer - under-house storage, ducted heating, split-system units and low-maintenance gardens.
The property is close to top schools including Belmont High, Highton Primary, Clairvaux Catholic School and Christian College.
Its also within easy reach of shopping in Waurn Ponds and Highton, Waurn Ponds train station, the Ring Road, Deakin University, Epworth hospital and Leisurelink pool.
And come summer, youre on the doorstep of the Surf Coast and Great Ocean Road.
